lead_paragraph: GLAUBERMAN--Alex J.,(Jack), died February 2, 2016, at age 97. Survived by his beloved wife of 70 years, Estelle (Kaplan). Devoted and loving father of Marcia and Carol. Born in New York City on July 3, 1918, he graduated from City College of New York in 1937 and Columbia Law School in 1942. He was a World War II veteran who served as a cryptanalyst in the Signal Intelligence Corps stationed in New Delhi, India. A respected attorney in New York City until his retirement at the age of 92, he will always be remembered for his integrity, intellect, good counsel and quick wit. A private service will be held on Friday. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GLAUBERMAN, ALEX J.
